original: @323a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @323a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'arya t'a r'a sto tra /
analyzed: a'arya t'a r'a sto tra /
translated: Āryatārāsthotra

original: bod skad du /🔽'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa /
analyzed: bod skad du / 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa /
translated: In Tibetan:🔽Praise of Noble Tārā🔽Homage to the noble Tārā, the venerable one!

original: rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Bowing to the lotus feet

original: lha dang lha min cod pan gyis //
analyzed: lha dang lha min cod pan gyis //
translated: of the crown of gods and demigods,

original: zhabs kyi padmo la btud de //
analyzed: zhabs kyi padmo la btud de //
translated: I pay homage to Tārā,

original: phongs pa kun las sgrol mdzad cing //
analyzed: phongs pa kun las sgrol mdzad cing //
translated: the liberator from all misfortunes.🔽To the one who, with compassion,

original: sgrol ma la ni phyag 'tshal lo //🔽rab 'bar dra bas khyab pa yi //🔽mnar med me yis gdungs pa la //
analyzed: sgrol ma la ni phyag 'tshal lo // rab 'bar dra bas khyab pa yi // mnar med me yis gdungs pa la //
translated: rains down nectar🔽on the fire of Avīci,🔽the hell of no respite,

original: thugs rjes bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs ma //
analyzed: thugs rjes bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs ma //
translated: enveloped by a web of flames,

original: sgrol ma la yang phyag 'tshal lo //🔽'gro drug gnas su yun ring du //
analyzed: sgrol ma la yang phyag 'tshal lo // 'gro drug gnas su yun ring du //
translated: I pay homage to Tārā.🔽To the one who, with great bliss,🔽gives rest to those weary🔽from long wandering

original: yang dang yang du 'khor ba yis //🔽dub pa dag la bde chen gyi //
analyzed: yang dang yang du 'khor ba yis // dub pa dag la bde chen gyi //
translated: in the abodes of the six classes of beings,

original: bde ba mchog gi ngal so mdzad //
analyzed: bde ba mchog gi ngal so mdzad //
translated: I pay homage to Tārā.

original: gzhan don mdzad pa'i lha mo khyod //
analyzed: gzhan don mdzad pa'i lha mo khyod //
translated: You, the goddess who acts for others' sake,

original: dran pa tsam gyis phongs sel ma //
analyzed: dran pa tsam gyis phongs sel ma //
translated: merely by being remembered, remove misfortune.

original: thugs rje brtse ldan khyod kyis ni //
analyzed: thugs rje brtse ldan khyod kyis ni //
translated: You who are endowed with compassionate love,

original: srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol mdzod //
analyzed: srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol mdzod //
translated: liberate me from the bonds of existence!

original: dus rnams rtag tu sems can la //
analyzed: dus rnams rtag tu sems can la //
translated: You are the goddess who is always impartial

original: bu bzhin snyoms pa'i lha mo khyod //
analyzed: bu bzhin snyoms pa'i lha mo khyod //
translated: toward sentient beings, as if they were your children.🔽You are the one who sends down rain

original: 'gro ba'i lo tog thams cad la //🔽char rgyun 'bebs la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i lo tog thams cad la // char rgyun 'bebs la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: on the crops of all beings.

original: nyi ma zla ba ji bzhin du //🔽'gro ba sems can thams cad kyi //
analyzed: nyi ma zla ba ji bzhin du // 'gro ba sems can thams cad kyi //
translated: Just like the sun and the moon,🔽you dispel the torment of darkness

original: mun pa'i gdung ba sel mdzad ma //
analyzed: mun pa'i gdung ba sel mdzad ma //
translated: for all sentient beings.

original: lha mo mchog la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽padma zla ba autpa la //
analyzed: lha mo mchog la phyag 'tshal lo // padma zla ba autpa la //
translated: I pay homage to the supreme goddess.

original: de bzhin dri med gdan stengs su //
analyzed: de bzhin dri med gdan stengs su //
translated: You sit upon a seat of lotus, moon, and utpala,

original: sku mdog sngo ljang 'gying bag can //
analyzed: sku mdog sngo ljang 'gying bag can //
translated: and are blue-green in color, swaying.🔽You hold an utpala flower.

original: autpal bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo//
analyzed: autpal bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo//
translated: I pay homage to you.

original: bskal pa grangs med gsum du tshogs bsags shing //
analyzed: bskal pa grangs med gsum du tshogs bsags shing //
translated: You accumulated the collections for three incalculable eons

original: bar du gcod pa'i sgrib pa kun spangs nas //
analyzed: bar du gcod pa'i sgrib pa kun spangs nas //
translated: and abandoned all obscurations that are obstacles.

original: bsdu dngos bzhi yis 'gro rnams sdud mdzad ma //
analyzed: bsdu dngos bzhi yis 'gro rnams sdud mdzad ma //
translated: You gather beings through the four means of gathering.

original: thugs rje dang ldan ma la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽sku yi skyon spangs mtshan dang dpe byad ldan //
analyzed: thugs rje dang ldan ma la phyag 'tshal lo // sku yi skyon spangs mtshan dang dpe byad ldan //
translated: I pay homage to you, the compassionate one.🔽Your body is free of faults and has the major and minor marks.

original: gsung gi skyon spangs ka la bing ka'i dbyangs //
analyzed: gsung gi skyon spangs ka la bing ka'i dbyangs //
translated: Your speech is free of faults and has the voice of a kalaviṅka bird.

original: thugs kyi skyon spangs shes bya mtha' dag mkhyen //
analyzed: thugs kyi skyon spangs shes bya mtha' dag mkhyen //
translated: You have abandoned the faults of mind and know all objects of knowledge.

original: bkra shis dpal 'bar ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bkra shis dpal 'bar ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to you, Tārā, blazing with auspicious glory!

original: ji ltar nor bu chu 'dang ltar //🔽lha mo khyod kyis rtag par ni //
analyzed: ji ltar nor bu chu 'dang ltar // lha mo khyod kyis rtag par ni //
translated: Just as a water-cleansing gem🔽always clears the turbidity of water,

original: 'gro ba'i sems rnyog sel mdzad cing //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i sems rnyog sel mdzad cing //
translated: O goddess, you clear the turbidity of beings’ minds

original: 'gro don brtson la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'gro don brtson la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: and strive for the welfare of beings—homage to you!

original: gang @323b gis khyod kyi mtshan bzung cing //
analyzed: gang @323b gis khyod kyi mtshan bzung cing //
translated: Those who hold your name

original: bstod dang bsgrub pa byas pa rnams //
analyzed: bstod dang bsgrub pa byas pa rnams //
translated: and praise and practice you

original: rtag tu 'bras bu yod par mdzad //
analyzed: rtag tu 'bras bu yod par mdzad //
translated: always have success.

original: mi bsnyel khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: mi bsnyel khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to you, Tārā, who never forget!

original: rje btsun ma sgrol ma la bstod pa d'i pam k'a ra shr'i dzny'a nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: rje btsun ma sgrol ma la bstod pa d'i pam k'a ra shr'i dzny'a nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: This praise of the Venerable Tārā was composed by Dipamkarabhadrajñāna.

original: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o//
translated: It was translated by the Indian preceptor himself and the Tibetan translator Tsültrim Gyalwa.
